info.title: Voucherify API
info.description: Voucherify promotion engine REST API. Please see https://docs.voucherify.io/docs for more details.

post.description:
This method adds or removes balance to an existing loyalty card that is assigned to a holder. The removal of points will consume the points that expire the soonest. 

 >ðŸš§ Async Action
> 
> This is an async action. If you want to perform several add or remove loyalty card balance actions in a short time and their order matters, set up sufficient time-out between the calls.

requestBody.description: Specify the point adjustment along with the expiration mechanism.

400.description: Returns an error if the expiration date was defined incorrectly in the request payload.

value.details: Expiration date cannot be set in the past

LoyaltiesMembersBalanceUpdateRequestBody.title: Loyalties Members Balance Update Request Body

points.description:
Incremental balance to be added to/subtracted from the loyalty card.

- To add points: 100
- To subtract points, add a minus: -100

expiration_type.description:
Set the type of expiration for added points.

`PROGRAM_RULES`: Inherit rules from campaign.
`NON_EXPIRING`: Points never expire.
`CUSTOM_DATE`: Points expire on a particular date. Requires expiration_date parameter.

expiration_date.description: Set expiration date for added points, i.e. `YYYY-MM-DD`. This parameter is required only when expiration_type is set to `CUSTOM_DATE`.

source_id.description: The merchant's transaction ID if it is different from the Voucherify transaction ID. It is really useful in case of an integration between multiple systems. It can be a transaction ID from a CRM system, database or 3rd-party service.

LoyaltiesMembersBalanceUpdateResponseBod.title: Loyalties Members Balance Update Response Body

points.description: The incremental points removed or added to the current balance on the loyalty card.

total.description: The total of points accrued over the lifetime of the loyalty card.

type.description: The type of voucher being modified.

object.description: The type of the object represented by JSON. Default is balance.

related_object.description: Defines the object that is being modified with the values that are returned in the balance object.

id.description: Identifies the loyalty card that is being modified, this is the ID that was assigned by the Voucherify API.

operation_type.description: The type of operation being performed.

key.description: Short string describing the kind of error which occurred.

message.description: A human-readable message providing a short description of the error.

details.description: A human-readable message providing more details about the error.

request_id.description: This ID is useful when troubleshooting and/or finding the root cause of an error response by our support team.

resource_id.description: Unique resource ID that can be used in another endpoint to get more details.

error.description: Includes additional information about the error.

message.description: The message configured by the user in a validation rule.
